__e: She'll understand I had no choice, the kid's waited 9 years, isn't that enough?
No judge in the world will understand you offering another man your wife.
I am at a loss to know what to say to her. She would never understand about him. But I must see her before I go.
Guess nobody ever will. But I know what I'm doing. And I know I'm right.
What I learned this summer is that no matter how much people think they understand war war will never understand people.
If I do not come, he did not understand why.
You've got to carry on but he just won't get it
